subject: [Radiance-general] HDR extension in rad, trad
body:
On Oct 25, 2008, at 8:20 AM, Axel Jacobs wrote:

I rather like (and have become accustomed to, and have built scripts
around) the .pic extension referring to a raw Radiance-generated
image.  I dunno how everyone else feels, but with all the available
sources for hdr images, some of which we can call "hdr" images, I'd
rather keep our good old .pic extension as a Radiance community
standard.
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] HDR extension in rad, trad
